name: HoloFighter (Hololive fangame)
description:
Holoive Fighting Game

It is a fan-made game.

The game is still in development, players can control Korone to fight the enemy.

In this demo version, the game will spawn a new enemy in the scene when the enemy dies.  

Players can test any movement in the game, there is no time limit and players can open the game settings to enable/disable enemy movement or get unlimited energy/stamina. 

Game Controls

Jump - W

Move Left - A

Move Right - D

Crouch - S

Punch - J

Kick - K                                   

Guard - L

Dodge / Dash - Space

Special Attack 1 - U

Special Attack 2 - I

Pause - Esc

Next Update
